data.title: NBA All-Star Alonzo Mourning Book Signing Set for Nov. 26 at Hudson News in Miami International Airport
data.meta_description: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. , Nov. 19 /PRNewswire/ -- Hudson News, the nation's only national newsstand brand, announces that seven-time NBA All-Star Alonzo Mourning will be signing...
data.text:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. , Nov. 19 /PRNewswire/ -- Hudson News, the nation's only national newsstand brand, announces that seven-time NBA All-Star Alonzo Mourning will be signing his new book, "Resilience: Faith, Focus, Triumph" at Hudson News, Concourse E, at Miami International Airport on Wednesday, November 26 , from 3:00 to 5:00 p.m. This newsstand is Pre-Security.

(Logo: http://www.newscom.com/cgi-bin/prnh/20060705/NYW034LOGO )

The 256-page hard cover book was published by Random House Publishing in September. It is a powerful and deeply personal account of the author's battle with kidney disease. In 2000, Mourning was on top of the world: He had a lucrative new contract, an Olympic gold medal, and a beautiful family -- all that plus the fame and wealth he had earned playing the game he loved.

But in September of that year, he was diagnosed with a rare and fatal kidney disease. After finding an organ donor in 2003, Mourning battled his way back to health and the NBA, winning a championship with the Miami Heat in 2006.

Yet Mourning believed that the most important and fulfilling part of his life still lay ahead, and he vowed to make his second chance count by dedicating his life to others. Basketball, it turned out, was just the vehicle that would allow him to devote his talents and energies to a greater cause. Mourning is a national spokesman for the National Kidney Foundation and operates Alonzo Mourning Charities, including Zo's Fund for Life.

Beginning Dec. 1 , customers can log onto the Hudson Group website to vote for their favorite book titles of 2008. All entrants will be eligible to win all 30 Hudson's Best Books of 2008! Visit www.hudsongroup.com (after Dec. 1 ) for more details.

About Hudson Group: Hudson Group is a wholly-owned subsidiary of international duty-free travel retailer Dufry. Hudson operates more than 550 newsstands, bookstores, cafes and premier specialty retail shops in more than 70 airports and transportation terminals throughout North America . The company's flagship concept, Hudson News, is North America's only national newsstand brand.

SOURCE Hudson Group
